attributes.action: Hurry up and START the war with Iran, and if need be Pakistan also to finish off terror oppression of the west
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Iranian goverment IS responsible for some british deaths in iraq and Pakistan has had 6 years to eliminate terrorism and extremists and have not done enough, they are overdue to be toppled.
People in Britain only see death and destruction and dont realise the benefits for our nations future and security.
I ask the goverment to be a bit more open about what they do and stop talking to us as if were idiots. If we lose this so called war on terror your grandkids WILL suffer. Bring on a world goverment or body and scrap the United nations as it stands right now.
Get talking to Russia and China and publically ask them to join NATO or start another military branch which the world could be part of, were not war mongerers we just want a stable and better future for the world. 
WE NEED TO JOIN UP AS A PEOPLE.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
